name: go-plus
description: Makes working with Go in Atom awesome.
author: Joe Fitzgerald <jfitzgerald@pivotal.io> (http://github.com/joefitzgerald)

panelDisplayMode.title: Panel Display Mode
panelDisplayMode.description: Control the behavior of the go-plus panel when a new Atom window is opened

maxPanelHeight.title: Maximum Panel Height
maxPanelHeight.description: Prevent the panel from occupying the entire window

minPanelHeight.title: Minimum Panel Height
minPanelHeight.description: Ensure the panel doesn't disappear when open

currentPanelHeight.title: Current Panel Height
currentPanelHeight.description: The height of the panel (this is changed when you drag the panel to resize it, so the setting is preserved)

formatOnSave.title: Run Format Tool On Save
formatOnSave.description: Run the configured format tool each time a file is saved

tool.title: Format Tool
tool.description: Choose one: goimports, goreturns, or gofmt

runTestsOnSave.title: Run Tests On Save
runTestsOnSave.description: Run `go test -coverprofile` each time a file is saved

runTestsWithShortFlag.title: Run Tests With Short Flag Set

coverageHighlightMode.title: Coverage Highlight Mode
coverageHighlightMode.description: Control the way that coverage highlighting occurs

focusPanelIfTestsFail.title: Focus The go-plus Panel If Tests Fail
focusPanelIfTestsFail.description: If the panel is hidden, or the panel is showing a different tab, the panel will be expanded and the test tab focused when tests fail.
